alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 09 at 3:00PM CDT until September 09 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CUSTER COUNTY... At 259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Anselmo, or 16 miles northwest of Broken Bow, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Anselmo. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 259 and 266. Highway 92 between mile markers 259 and 270. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
